2003790.name: RPG Maker MZ - Never Ever Clean Up Tileset
2003790.description:
We have all been there - enthusiastically working on something and tidiness goes out of the window!
Messy is life, and life is messy. There is nothing to be ashamed of.
Come and get your hands on all sorts of clutter objects and nasty bugs!

*******************************************
Tiles：2 files
Characters：4 files
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
